    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dispersing Bullet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1019)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 173 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 50 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** [sling bullet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The metals used to forge this lead shot were taken from a variety of continents and barely stay together. When an activated _dispersing bullet_ hits a target, the bullet scatters into a sphere of metal shards as the metals try to return to their places of origin. All creatures in a 10-foot emanation around the target of the attack (and not including the target) must succeed at a DC 21 Fortitude save or be [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 10 feet from the target (15 feet on a critical failure).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
